https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/veh8LYQUF8fBXSKYqpRjwlIStxZ.jpg Feeling career burnout, pop star Angelina escapes to grant a young fan's wish in small-town New York, where she not only finds the inspiration to revitalize her career but also a shot at true love. Christmas With You
